Texts.Eng:
The Novakids are a mysterious race of 'interstellar gas-bag people'. They have few charted settlements and no documented history. 
 
 Diet: Omnivore 
 
 ^orange;Perks^reset;: 
 +^green;20^reset;% Energy, +^green;25^reset;% Knockback Resist, +^green;5^reset;% Speed
 Resist: +^green;25^reset;% Fire, ^green;20^reset;% Ice, +^green;40^reset;% Radiation
 Immune: Burning, Radiation Burn
 
 ^orange;Environment^reset;: 
 On ^green;Radioactive^reset; biomes gain ^green;15^reset;% Energy and Health
 ^green;Regenerate^reset; from sunlight when fed. +^green;20^reset;% Energy Regen.
 Night regen ^red;consumes food^reset; and -^red;25^reset;% Energy 
 
 ^orange;Weapons^reset;:
 Pistol (single): +^green;9^reset;% Damage
 Pistol (dual): +^green;25^reset;% Knockback Resist, +^green;8^reset;% Speed
 Sniper: +^green;2^reset;% Crit and +^green;20^reset;% Crit Damage
 Shotgun: +^green;14^reset;% dmg, +^green;12^reset;% Crit Dmg
 Whip: +^green;15^reset;% Damage and +^green;10^reset;% Speed
 
 ^red;Weaknesses^reset;: 
 Health x^red;0.9^reset;
 Weak: -^red;15^reset;% Physical, -^red;20^reset;%Electric, -^red;40^reset;% Shadow
